description: This file defines the main React component for the application's home page, including UI layout, quick action cards, and a chat input with reference display. It uses React hooks and Next.js components.

methods.name: Home
methods.description: Main React functional component representing the home page, managing state for selected references and rendering UI sections.

methods.name: ActionCard
methods.description: Reusable React component for displaying an action card with a link button.
